name: Pillows
description:
This game is remake of game called Combat Pillows(Bulánci). We created it as school project. 

It is local multiplayer game for up to 4 people + bots. Maximum pillow count is 8. AI is a little bit overpowered. You can choose between 3 difficulty for each AI. But the real fun is with your friends.

Game mods:

  • Deathmatch
  • Team Deathmatch
  • King of the hill

Deathmatches can be modifyed to 3 types: timed, kills and lives.

You can choose name and color for your pillow. Game contains two secret skins.

You are controling your pillow movement in 8 directions with ability to roll in base 4 directions. You can pick up weapons from ground and then swap between them.

In future updates we are planning on adding maps and online multiplayer feature.

I really recommend reading Credits in Options tab.

If you have found bug or have some idea how to improve our game you can contact us on this email: itworksstudios20@gmail.com
